trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>styra aktiverar den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>händelse när knappen Infoga (en knapp med dess `CommandName` -egenskapen angetts till "Infoga") i kontrollen klickas, men när den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen infogar posten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: På så sätt kan du ange en händelsehanterare som utför en anpassad rutin, till exempel kontrollera resultatet av en insert-åtgärden när den här händelsen inträffar.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
